title: Transformation with Natural Logs: Exponential Decay
question_text:
The regression equation between the exponential decay of a material ($D$) in grams and the time ($t$) in years is:
$$ { \ln (\hat{D}) }= 0.94 \ln(t)$$
Which of the following is the closest to the predicted value of exponential decay when the time is $30\text{ years}$?
